articles.title: AP PHOTOS: Roman era brought to life at Romanian festival

The clatter of shields and battle cries filled the misty air as warriors lifted their swords. Nearby, gladiators fought each other for their lives.

articles.title: Dave Caulkin, Associated Press photographer, dies at 77
articles.description: Dave Caulkin, a retired Associated Press photographer who captured the iconic moment when ice dancers Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean won the 1984 Olympic gold medal, has died
articles.content: LONDON -- Dave Caulkin, a retired Associated Press photographer who captured the iconic moment when ice dancers Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean won the 1984 Olympic gold medal, has died. He was 77… [+4814 chars]

articles.title: Florida monitors a growing Tropical Storm Ian in Caribbean
